MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Queen Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:06am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete the repairs to our underground electricity network on Queen Street affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15pm on the 29th of January 2021
